headline: Albemarle Corp (NYSE:ALB) Reports Q4 2025 Revenue Beat and EPS Miss
summary: Albemarle (ALB) Q4 2025 earnings beat on revenue but missed on EPS, causing a negative market reaction. The lithium leader faces cost pressures amid strategic adjustments.

headline: Albemarle (ALB) Reports Q4 Loss, Beats Revenue Estimates
summary: Albemarle (ALB) delivered earnings and revenue surprises of -33.00% and +5.80%, respectively, for the quarter ended December 2025. Do the numbers hold clues to what lies ahead for the stock?

headline: Albemarle: Q4 Earnings Snapshot
summary: The Charlotte, North Carolina-based company said it had a loss of $3.87 per share. Losses, adjusted for non-recurring costs, were 53 cents per share. The results fell short of Wall Street expectations.

raw.headline: Albemarle: Q4 Earnings Snapshot
raw.summary: The Charlotte, North Carolina-based company said it had a loss of $3.87 per share. Losses, adjusted for non-recurring costs, were 53 cents per share. The results fell short of Wall Street expectations.

headline: Albemarle Announces Plans to Idle its Kemerton Lithium Hydroxide Processing Plant
summary: Albemarle Corporation (NYSE: ALB), a global leader in providing essential elements for mobility, energy, connectivity and health, today announced it will idle the remaining operating train, Train 1, at its Kemerton lithium hydroxide processing plant in Western Australia and place it into care and maintenance effective immediately. Today's announcement follows actions in 2024 to place Train 2 into care and maintenance and to cease expansion plans for Trains 3 and 4.

Today's announcement follows actions in 2024 to place Train 2 into care and maintenance and to cease expansion plans for Trains 3 and 4.

headline: ArcelorMittal to Build New EAF in Dunkirk to Advance Decarbonization

headline: MEOH & Partners Launch U.K.'s First Biomethanol Bunkering Service
summary: MEOH teams up with Exolum and Orsted to launch the U.K.'s first biomethanol bunkering service at Immingham, targeting maritime decarbonization.
